If there are multiple results, please indicate them as XXX-XXX.
catalyst: XXX
co_catalyst: XXX

amount of acetaldehyde was also detected with negligible amount of other hydrocarbons.Following control experiments were also conducted: (1) irradiating the reactor with CO 2 flow but without catalysts; (2) using pure Ar instead of 10 CO 2 N 2 ; (3) dark experiment without light irradiation.None of them showed obvious formation of products within our detection limits (Fig. S1).The real-time CO yield and accumulated CO production over irradiation time are displayed in Fig. 8.It was observed that the CO was

the activity of the catalyst by washing the used catalyst with deionized water.To our surprise, this facile method turned out to be very effective.As shown in Fig. 10, used PB550-Bi 2 WO 6 showed almost the same real-time CO yield and accumulated CO production in 5-h reaction duration after washed with deionized water despite of a little loss of catalyst mass during the renewing process.To exclude the possibility that the recovery of the catalyst might be caused by contacting with water molecule, in situ

we kept the reacted catalyst in the dark without changing the atmosphere and temperature for 12 h.Then a second reaction run was carried out by turning on the light again.The initial production rate of CO in this run was a little higher than the final rate in the first run and no sharp decrease was investigated afterwards.This indicated that the surface property of the original PB550-Bi 2 WO 6 was changed after a period of irradiation and reaction.It was possibly caused by the intermediate species taking

result.query:
Please find the category of Light_source and Lamp from the provided context which describe an solar chemical experiment.
The generation condition of the extraction is given: If Light_source is Solar or Solar Simulator, Lamp is always Solar Simulator.
Please only select the generation from the provided possible choices.
Possible Choices:
Light_source: ['UV', 'Solar', 'UV-Vis', 'Monochromatic', 'Solar Simulator']
Lamp: ['Fluorescent', 'Mercury', 'Halogen', 'Mercury-Xenon', 'LED', 'Tungsten', 'Xenon', 'Tungsten-Halide', 'Solar Simulator']
Please generating restrictively follow the format, and must start the generation as the format. Do not generate anything else.
Light_source: XXX
Lamp: XXX

evidence.pdf_reference: top.The light source was a 300 W Xe lamp (PLS-SXE300, Beijing Trust-tech Co. Ltd., China).A VISREF filter and a UV420 cutoff filter (Beijing Trust-tech Co. physically absorbed on the catalyst.As mentioned above, a little amount of acetaldehyde was also detected and there existed intermediates species on the surface of Bi 2 WO 6 during irradiation.Compared with CO, acetaldehyde needs more electrons and protons to form and thus could not be the first product generated.Meanwhile, TPD experiment showed that CO 2 can be chemically adsorbed on Bi 2 WO 6 (Fig. 7).It can be deduced that CO could be generated from the actively adsorbed CO 2 species immediately by
